goals: Automate product data enrichment and synchronization
Establish a single source of truth for product information
Reduce manual errors in channel listings
additionalContext:
Pain Points
1. Product data inconsistency — SKU names, attributes, and descriptions differ across Shopify, Amazon, and Sephora.
2. Manual onboarding for new SKUs — Each product must be formatted and uploaded per channel.
3. Frequent listing errors — Missing images or mismatched variants lead to listing rejections.
4. Disconnected PIM workflows — Salsify updates don't propagate to all systems.
5. Time-consuming updates — Marketing and operations teams manually reconcile product data across systems.

Integration Goals
• Enable bidirectional sync between Salsify, Shopify, Amazon, and NetSuite.
• Centralize product data and digital assets under Salsify and Bynder as the golden record.
• Replace manual CSV uploads with automated, event-driven updates.
• Provide real-time SKU-level visibility and analytics in BigQuery.
• Improve product data governance and consistency across all sales channels.
